con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.webstuff.eti.br/soap/crm/generated/jaxb/customer" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://www.webstuff.eti.br/soap/crm/generated/jaxb/customer" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.webstuff.eti.br/soap/crm/generated/jaxb/customer"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.webstuff.eti.br/soap/crm/generated/jaxb/customer" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="GetCustomerDetailRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetCustomerDetailResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CustomerDetail" type="tns:CustomerDetail"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--Nova consulta--> <xs:element name="GetAllCustomerDetailRequest"> <xs:complexType></xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetAllCustomerDetailResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="CustomerDetail" type="tns:CustomerDetail"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--Nova operação - deletar um cliente por ID--> <xs:element name="DeleteCustomerRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DeleteCustomerResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:Status"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="Status"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAILURE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="CustomerDetail"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="phone" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetCustomerDetailRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetCustomerDetailRequest" name="GetCustomerDetailRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetAllCustomerDetailRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetAllCustomerDetailRequest" name="GetAllCustomerDetailRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DeleteCustomerRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:DeleteCustomerRequest" name="DeleteCustomerRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DeleteCustomerResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:DeleteCustomerResponse" name="DeleteCustomerResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetCustomerDetailResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetCustomerDetailResponse" name="GetCustomerDetailResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetAllCustomerDetailResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetAllCustomerDetailResponse" name="GetAllCustomerDetailResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CustomerPort"> <wsdl:operation name="GetCustomerDetail"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetCustomerDetailRequest" name="GetCustomerDetailRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetCustomerDetailResponse" name="GetCustomerDetailResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetAllCustomerDetail"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetAllCustomerDetailRequest" name="GetAllCustomerDetailRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetAllCustomerDetailResponse" name="GetAllCustomerDetailResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="DeleteCustomer"> <wsdl:input message="tns:DeleteCustomerRequest" name="DeleteCustomerRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:DeleteCustomerResponse" name="DeleteCustomerResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CustomerPortSoap11" type="tns:CustomerPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="GetCustomerDetail"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="GetCustomerDetailRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="GetCustomerDetailResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetAllCustomerDetail"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="GetAllCustomerDetailRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="GetAllCustomerDetailResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="DeleteCustomer"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="DeleteCustomerRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="DeleteCustomerResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CustomerPortService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:CustomerPortSoap11" name="CustomerPortSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8180/ws"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
